select name as tableName from sysobjects where xtype='u'
and name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')

select count(*) from sysobjects where xtype='u'
and name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
select name as tableName from sysobjects where xtype='u' and name = #{tableName}
select a.name as columnName ,b.name as dataType from syscolumns a left join sys.types b on a.xtype = b.user_type_id where id=(select max(id) from sysobjects where xtype='u' and name=#{tableName} );
